alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 10:09PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Buffalo County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1009 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Miller, or 24 miles northwest of Kearney, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Buffalo County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
